author: rwaldhoff
msg: Several changes completed over the weekend:
+ moving cookie parsing to processResponseHeaders method
+ track visited paths to detect HTTP redirect loops
+ track authentication attempts to detect bad creds
+ re-enabled POST and PUT request body processing
